Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to awards of grants from the beginning farmers NY fund
Summary: Changes the eligibility and criteria for awards of grants from the beginning farmers NY fund to enable more farmers to participate; requires that tiers be established for grants less than $15,000.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act, in relation to the beginning farmers NY fund
